journal-meta.journal-title: Journal of the American Psychoanalytic Association

body.p: Anna M. Badini, member, Board of the Connecticut Society for Psychoanalytic Psychology; private practice, Stamford, CT.
Daniel E. Bendor, Assistant Clinical Professor of Psychiatry, Yale University School of Medicine.
Daria Colombo, faculty, Seattle Psychoanalytic Institute.

Aaron H. Esman, Professor Emeritus of Clinical Psychiatry, Weill Cornell Medical College; faculty, New York Psychoanalytic Institute; faculty, Columbia Center for Psychoanalytic Training and Research.
Prudence L. Gourguechon, faculty, Chicago Institute for Psychoanalysis; Training and Supervising Analyst, Wisconsin Provisional Psychoanalytic Institute.
Deborah Harms, associate faculty, Michigan Psychoanalytic Institute; adjunct professional staff, St. John Hospital; adjunct faculty and Clinical Supervisor, University of Detroit/Mercy.

Nancy Kulish, Adjunct Professor, Department of Psychiatry, School of Medicine, Wayne State University; Adjunct Professor of Psychology, University of Detroit/Mercy; Training and Supervising Analyst, Michigan Psychoanalytic Institute.

Rebecca Mair, associate faculty, Michigan Psychoanalytic Institute; adjunct professional staff, St. John Hospital; adjunct faculty, Michigan School of Professional Psychology; Fellow and Board Member, American Academy of Healthcare Providers in the Addictive Disorders.

David Scharff, Teaching Analyst, Washington Center for Psychoanalysis; Supervising Analyst, International Institute for Psychoanalytic Training; Clinical Professor of Psychiatry, Georgetown University.
Richard M. Waugaman, Training and Supervising Analyst Emeritus, Washington Psychoanalytic Institute; Clinical Professor of Psychiatry, Georgetown University School of Medicine.
